item.title: 让他们无法拒绝的马阿拉歌协议
item.description:
特朗普有说服手段来达成广泛的美元协议 —，但与真正重要的国家除外。【原文：

Trump has the means of persuasion to get a broad dollar agreement — except with the country that really matters. 

】

item.title: 据说紫光集团将向银行申请 10 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国IT服务公司紫光集团（Unisplendour Corp）已选定法国巴黎银行（BNP Paribas SA）、招商银行国际（China Merants Bank International）和中证金融有限公司（CSC Financial Co.【原文：Chinese IT services company Unisplendour Corp. has picked BNP Paribas SA, China Merchants Bank International and CSC Financial Co. for its planned second listing in Hong Kong, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 当央行使用 Instagram 时，请注意 "崩溃 "一词
item.description:
货币政策的主宰者们正在转向社交媒体来接触年轻选民。【原文：

The masters of monetary policy are turning to social media to reach young constituents. 

】

item.title: 日本出生人数创历史最低纪录，人口危机加剧
item.description: 日本的出生人数再创历史新低，这凸显了一个日益严峻的挑战，即如何用已经越来越少的纳税工人来承担老龄化社会不断膨胀的社会保障成本。【原文：The number of births in Japan fell to another record low, underscoring the growing challenge of how to shoulder ballooning social security costs for an aging society with what’s already become an ever shrinking pool of tax-paying workers.】

item.title: 米其林首席执行官称法国正在用税收 "扼杀 "本国工业
item.description: 米其林首席执行官弗洛朗-梅内戈（Florent Menegaux）说，法国正在通过过度征税摧毁其工业基础，并隐晦地威胁要把业务转移到其他地方。【原文：France is destroying its industrial base by over-taxation, Michelin Chief Executive Officer Florent Menegaux said, with a thinly veiled threat to take business elsewhere.】

item.title: 本土竞争白热化，奔驰将在中国裁员
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz Group AG）及其子公司正计划裁减多达 15%的在华员工，主要集中在融资和销售部门，因为这家德国制造商面临着全球最大汽车市场日益加剧的竞争。【原文：Mercedes-Benz Group AG and its subsidiaries are planning to cut up to 15% of the automaker’s workforce in China, mainly within its financing and sales units, as the German manufacturer faces intensifying competition in the world’s largest car market, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 由 Accel 支持的金融科技初创公司寻求 1.2 亿美元的新一轮融资
item.description: Nala 是一家由 Accel Partners 等风险投资基金支持的非洲初创企业，其目标是在下一轮融资中通过出售 10% 到 15% 的股权筹集多达 1.2 亿美元的资金。【原文：Nala, an African startup backed by venture-capital funds such as Accel Partners, aims to raise as much as $120 million in its next financing round by selling an equity stake of between 10% and 15%.】

item.title: 丰田从丑闻中恢复，国内销量反弹
item.description: 丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp. ）今年的开局虽然缓慢，但很有希望，因为日本国内的反弹抵消了海外销售停滞的影响。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s year is off to a slow but promising start after stagnant sales abroad were offset by a rebound in Japan.】

item.title: 日本金属工人工会要求加薪创纪录
item.description: 代表制造商的日本一个主要工会表示，其会员在与雇主的年度谈判中寻求创纪录的工资增长，这是日本工资增长势头持续的一个早期迹象。【原文：A major Japanese labor union representing manufacturers said its members are seeking a record wage increase in annual negotiations with employers, in an early sign of continued momentum for pay growth in the country.】

item.title: 特朗普加深关税不确定性，欧洲股票期货下跌
item.description: 欧洲股票期货在清淡的亚洲交易中下跌，原因是投资者对唐纳德-特朗普和白宫就对单一货币地区征收更高关税的计划发表的明显相互矛盾的评论做出了回应。【原文：European stock futures fell in thin Asian trading as investors responded to apparently contradictory comments from Donald Trump and the White House on plans to impose higher tariffs on the single-currency region.】

item.title: 印度波动率指数显示交易商并未恐慌
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: AppLovin 的低迷打击了持股 40 亿美元的中国投资者
item.description: AppLovin 公司在过去一年中的迅猛涨势和过去一周的突然跌停，令其最大的股东们心惊肉跳。【原文：AppLovin Corp.’s blistering rally over the past year — and sudden stumble over the past week — has whipsawed its biggest shareholders.】

item.title: YouTube 明星 MrBeast 正在以 50 亿美元的估值筹集资金
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，YouTube 明星 MrBeast 正在寻求融资数亿美元，以扩大其业务，此轮融资将使其公司估值达到约 50 亿美元。【原文：YouTube star MrBeast is looking to raise a couple hundred million dollars to expand his business in a funding round that would value his company at about $5 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所重量级公司计划如何在 2025 年赚钱
item.description: 二月份的报告季即将结束，主持人丽贝卡-琼斯（Rebecca Jones）和彭博财经编辑亚当-海（Adam Haigh）将从澳大利亚最大的几家上市公司的首席执行官那里剖析全球和本地问题的重要启示。【原文：With the February reporting season almost wrapped up, host Rebecca Jones and Bloomberg finance editor Adam Haigh dissect the key takeaways on global and local issues from the CEOs of some of Australia’s biggest listed companies.】

item.title: 中国太阳能游说团在创纪录的一年后看到安装量减少
item.description: 中国太阳能产业预计 2025 年的装机量将有所下降，因为去年前所未有的新增装机量激增，导致电网竞相跟上。【原文：China’s solar industry expects installations to drop in 2025 after an unprecedented surge in additions last year left power grids racing to keep up.】

item.title: 重启世界顶级核电站面临延迟风险，日本电力公司股价下跌
item.description: 东京电力公司（Tokyo Electric Power Co.）的股价创下近五个月来的最大跌幅，此前该公司表示将推迟反应堆的升级改造，从而有可能使重启世界最大核电站的计划推迟。【原文：Tokyo Electric Power Co. slumped the most in almost five months after the utility said it would delay upgrades at reactors, risking to push back plans to restart the world’s biggest nuclear power plant.】

item.title: 豪瑟称澳大利亚央行不太可能任命持不同意见的董事会成员
item.description: 澳大利亚央行副行长安德鲁-豪瑟（Andrew Hauser）表示，澳大利亚央行不太可能在新的货币政策委员会制度下任命持不同意见的董事会成员，因为央行试图限制利率决策的 "噪音"。【原文：Australia’s central bank is unlikely to name dissenting board members under its new monetary policy committee regime as it tries to limit the amount of “noise” around interest rate decisions, according to Deputy Governor Andrew Hauser.】

item.title: 加巴德呼吁调查英国苹果公司的后门请求
item.description: 美国国家情报总监图尔西-加巴德（Tulsi Gabbard）呼吁进行调查，并对英国政府下令苹果公司为其全球客户数据建立后门表示担忧。【原文：US Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard called for an investigation and expressed concern after the UK government ordered Apple Inc. to build a backdoor into the global data of its customers.】

item.title: 关税困惑支撑避险需求，黄金保持稳定
item.description: 黄金在上一交易日收盘时几无变动，在投资者权衡美国总统唐纳德-特朗普有关其计划颁布关税计划（包括对欧盟）的最新声明后，黄金保持在创纪录附近。【原文：Gold held near a record after closing little changed in the previous session, as investors weighed President Donald Trump’s latest statements about his plans to enact tariff plans, including on the European Union.】

item.title: 本田交易破裂后，日产准备更换首席执行官
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.【原文：Nissan Motor Co. is drawing up plans to replace its chief executive officer following another dismal set of earnings and the collapse of talks to combine with Honda Motor Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 较短期的亚洲债券显示出抵御关税风险的能力
item.description: 年期较短的亚洲新兴债券为投资者提供了一个避风港，以规避肆虐全球市场的关税风险。【原文：Emerging Asian bonds with shorter tenors are offering investors a refuge from tariff risks that are roiling global markets.】

item.title: MercadoLibre 的加尔佩林在创纪录后售出 3.3 亿美元股票
item.description: MercadoLibre 公司联合创始人兼首席执行官马科斯-加尔佩林（Marcos Galperin）在收益后股价大涨创下历史新高后，出售了他在该公司的部分持股。【原文：MercadoLibre Inc. co-founder and chief executive officer Marcos Galperin sold a portion of his holdings in the company after a post-earnings rally catapulted shares to a record high.】

item.title: 重要审查主席称英国水务部门信任缺失
item.description: 对水务行业进行全面审查的委员会主席表示，在公司决策失误和业绩落后之后，私有化的水务行业需要重建信任。【原文：The privatized water sector needs to rebuild trust after poor decisions and lagging performance by companies, according to the chair of the commission undertaking a sweeping review of the industry.】

item.title: 印度家族办公室蓬勃发展，但也不乏失败案例
item.description: 印度的崛起以及随之而来的财富繁荣，已经造就了超过 86.8 万名百万富翁和大约 185 名亿万富翁。【原文：India’s rise — and ensuing wealth boom — has minted more than 868,000 millionaires and some 185 billionaires.】

item.title: 日本股票投资者通过新基金寻找收购目标
item.description: 一项投资于日本公司的基金将于本周五启动，预计这些公司将成为收购标的，这反映了日本公司治理改革的影响。【原文：A fund investing in Japanese companies that are expected to be in the crosshairs of takeover bids will launch on Friday in a reflection of the impact of the country’s corporate governance reforms.】

item.title: 中国困境下凯德置地利润增幅低于预期
item.description: 新加坡凯德置地投资有限公司（CapitaLand Investment Ltd.）公布的年度业绩未达预期，原因是利率环境升高和对中国的风险敞口带来的不利因素，盖过了私人基金等领域的收益。【原文：Singapore’s CapitaLand Investment Ltd. reported annual results that missed estimates amid headwinds from an elevated interest-rate environment and its exposure to China that overshadowed gains from areas like private funds.】

item.title: 双子座公司温克艾沃斯称美国证券交易委员会结束调查，未采取任何行动
item.description: 根据卡梅隆-温克艾沃斯（Cameron Winklevoss）在 X 上发布的帖子，美国证券交易委员会告知亿万富翁温克艾沃斯双胞胎拥有的双子座信托公司（Gemini Trust Co.【原文：Gemini Trust Co., owned by billionaire Winklevoss twins, was told by the US Securities and Exchange Commission that the agency has closed its investigation into the crypto exchange according to a posting on X by Cameron Winklevoss.】

item.title: 美国关税和制裁成为焦点，石油价格维持在年内低点附近
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发出多项关税威胁，以及可能加强制裁，石油价格在今年最低收盘价附近企稳。【原文：Oil steadied around the lowest close this year, with multiple tariff threats from US President Donald Trump and the possibility of tighter sanctions in focus.】

item.title: 英伟达第四季度报告的主要观点
item.description: 以下是本周三英伟达公司发布的第四季度财报的主要内容：【原文：Here are the key takeaways from Nvidia Corp.’s fourth-quarter earnings report on Wednesday:】

item.title: 巴西国家石油公司意外亏损后宣布赔付 16 亿美元
item.description: 巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）周三宣布派发 91 亿雷亚尔（16 亿美元）的红利，但低于预期，因为第四季度出现了意外亏损。【原文：Petrobras announced 9.1 billion reais ($1.6 billion) in dividends on Wednesday that trailed estimates after a surprise loss in the fourth quarter.】
